meta.title: Query builder
control.info.separateValues: Separate multiple values with a comma.
modal.preview.title: Query returns {total, plural, =0 {no records} one {# record} other {# records}}. Previewing the first {limit, plural, one {# record} other {# records}}:
modal.banner.limit: This query returns more records than the maximum allowed; please modify the query to reduce the results.
modal.preview.title.empty: Query returns {total, plural, =0 {no records} one {# record} other {# records}}.
warning.deletedField: {value} in your query is no longer available. Please revise your query.
error.needsRefresh: The record type used by this list has changed; please refresh the list, and if needed, modify the query.
error.invalidEntity: The record type used by this list is currently unable to be used; please verify its definition.
